org.eurostates.area

Interface Area

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    State
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CustomState, NomadState, Town

    public interface Area
    The base class for all area based class

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default @NotNull org.bukkit.ChatColor getLegacyChatColour()
      Gets the Bukkit object for chat colours of the areas chat colour, see getLegacyChatColour() for more info
      char getLegacyChatColourCharacter()
      Gets the legacy minecraft chat colour char that belongs to the area
      @NotNull String getName()
      Gets the name of the area
      Set<Relationship> getRelationships()
      Gets the relationships that this area has with other states.
      @NotNull String getTag()
      gets the tag string of the area.
      Optional<WarRelationship> getWarWith(Town town)
      If the area is at war with the provided Town then the exact War relationship will be returned, however if a war is not between this area and the provided town then Optional.empty() will be returned

    • Method Detail

      • getTag

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getTag()
        gets the tag string of the area. This is typically between 3-4 characters.
        Returns:
        A string of the tag

      • getName

        @NotNull
@NotNull String getName()
        Gets the name of the area
        Returns:
        The name of the area

      • getLegacyChatColourCharacter

        char getLegacyChatColourCharacter()
        Gets the legacy minecraft chat colour char that belongs to the area
        Returns:
        The character of the colour

      • getRelationships

        Set<Relationship> getRelationships()
        Gets the relationships that this area has with other states. Note that the neutral relationships will not be contained within this set as no relationship implies that the relationship is neutral
        Returns:
        A set of the relationships for this area

      • getWarWith

        Optional<WarRelationship> getWarWith(Town town)
        If the area is at war with the provided Town then the exact War relationship will be returned, however if a war is not between this area and the provided town then Optional.empty() will be returned
        Parameters:
        town - The town to check with at war
        Returns:
        A Optional of the war relationship between this area and the provided town

      • getLegacyChatColour

        @NotNull
default @NotNull org.bukkit.ChatColor getLegacyChatColour()
        Gets the Bukkit object for chat colours of the areas chat colour, see getLegacyChatColour() for more info
        Returns:
        The Bukkit chat colour for this area
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If the character provided to the area is not valid
